DOC.brief_summary: Bioavailability study comparing two new nilotinib tablet formulations to an established nilotinib capsule formulation in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Comparing Two New Nilotinib Tablet Formulations to an Established Nilotinib Capsule Formulation in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion 1. Healthy adult male (18 55 yrs) and sterile or post menopausal female subjects 2. Body weight must be â‰¥50 kg and <100 kg, with a body mass index (BMI) >18 but <33. 3. Laboratory parameter values must fall within the normal range Exclusion 1. Female who is pregnant or breast feeding. 2. Contraindication to receiving nilotinib. 3. Smokers or user of tobacco products 4. A past medical history of clinically significant Electrocardiogram abnormalities, or a history/family history of long QTinterval syndrome. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
